text: WPKA-LP (99.9 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Apopka, Florida. The station is owned by VJIL Inc. It airs a Regional Mexican format. The station was assigned the WPKA-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on March 7, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * PKA-LP PKA-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2014 Category:2014 establishments in Florida Category:Regional Mexican radio stations in the United States PKA-LP Category:Orange County, Florida
title: WPKA-LP
